Template.SQL: select cloud_folder.cloud_folder_id FROM cloud_folder WHERE cloud_folder.parent_folder_refid = @ParentFolderID And Lower(cloud_folder.folder_name) = Lower(@FolderName) And cloud_folder.is_deleted = 0 And cloud_folder.auth_account_refid = @AccountID and cloud_folder.tenant_refid = @TenantID
